content.name: AP HUB Plot
content.description: A set of missions offered by the Boron and Atreus Corp leading to the HUB

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where values will be localized

param.name: FinalSector
param.comment: The Address of the destination. Overrides all other criteria.

param.name: PatrolSector
param.comment: The next sector on the way to the destination

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objectives and run the Objective library

param.name: Clear Enemies
param.comment: Only move on when there are no enemies around the player

param.name: UseTimer
param.comment: Override the plot signal and use a timer

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored

param.name: PatrolTime
param.comment: Duration of patrol per sector in seconds

money.exact: {value@L2M020.L0M34 Queens Harbour Reward} + {value@L2M020.L0M34 Queens Harbour Bonus}

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objective when the briefing is updated

param.name: Amount
param.comment: The amount of the ware needed

param.name: Feedback Name
param.comment: The value name for the feedback value

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objective when the briefing is updated

param.comment: The amount of the ware needed

param.name: Feedback Name
param.comment: The value name for the feedback value

param.comment: Set the objective when the briefing is updated

param.name: Amount
param.comment: The amount of the ware needed

param.name: Feedback Name
param.comment: The value name for the feedback value

create_ship.name: L2M020.Megalodon
create_ship.comment: Not invincible. Always check it exists
